card.name: Asternak
card.text: Unique. +2 to influence checks against any faction playable at his home site.

card.name: Bróin
card.text: Unique. +2 to prowess when facing an Orc strike or an Elf strike.

card.name: Calendal
card.text: Unique. May use a Palantír he bears. +2 EI against Elf characters. +2 to influence checks against Elf factions.

card.name: Carambor
card.text: Unique. Action: If your play deck has at least 20 cards in it, during step 10 of the movement process, tap Carambor to enable his company to move again using region movement. At least one of the region cards played must be a w; this is checked during step 2 of the movement process.

card.name: Dôgrib
card.text: Unique. 1 Corruption. Action: You may tap this character when facing an attack keyed to Forochel, Angmar, or Gundabad to cancel it. +2 prowess against strikes created by manifestations of Scorba.

card.name: Dunlending Spy
card.text: Unique. Action: May tap to cancel a detainment automatic-attack.

card.name: Gorbag
card.text: Unique. Leader. Discard on a body check result equal to his body. +3 EI against Orc characters. +3 to influence checks against Orc factions. Special: May be at a non-H site with Ringwraiths, but may not move with them.

card.name: Grishnákh
card.text: Unique. Discard on a body check result equal to his body.

card.name: Gulla
card.text: Unique. +1 prowess and -1 to the strike’s body when facing an Orc strike or an Elf strike.

card.name: Hendolen
card.text: Unique. +2 EI against Elf characters. +1 to influence checks against factions with F or B home sites. Action: May tap to cancel a detainment attack against his company.

card.name: Horseman in the Night
card.text: +1 to influence checks against factions. +1 prowess when facing a detainment strike.

card.name: Jerrek
card.text: Unique. +1 to influence checks against factions playable at sites in Harondor.

card.name: Lagduf
card.text: Unique. Discard on a body check result equal to his body.

card.name: Layos
card.text: Unique. +2 to influence checks against the Men of Dorwinion faction.

card.name: Lieutenant of Angmar
card.text: Unique. Leader. Manifestation of Rogrog. Discard on a body check result equal to his body. +4 EI against Orc characters and/or Troll characters. +4 to influence checks against Orc factions and Troll factions. If Lieutenant of Angmar is at Carn Dûm, your hand size increases by one.

card.name: Lieutenant of Dol Guldur
card.text: Unique. Leader. Manifestation of Gorfaur the Lame. Discard on a body check result equal to his body. +2 EI against Orc characters and/or Troll characters. +2 to influence checks against Orc factions and Troll factions. If Lieutenant of Dol Guldur is at Dol Guldur, your hand size increases by one.

card.name: Lieutenant of Morgul
card.text: Unique. Leader. Manifestation of Gothmog. Discard on a body check result equal to his body. +3 EI against Orc characters and/or Troll characters. +3 to influence checks against Orc factions and Troll factions. It Lieutenant of Morgul is at Minas Morgul, your hand size increases by one.

card.name: Luitprand
card.text: Unique. Action: Tap Luitprand if facing a Drake attack to cancel it.

card.name: Lieutenant of Barad-Dûr
card.text: Unique. Leader. Manifestation of Mouth of Sauron. +2 to influence checks against factions. May be in a company with Orcs and Trolls.

card.name: Muzgash
card.text: Unique. Discard on a body check result equal to his body.

card.name: Náin
card.text: Unique. +1 prowess when facing an Orc strike or an Elf strike.

card.name: Nevido Smôd
card.text: Unique. +2 to influence checks against factions with Home Sites in Horse Plains.

card.name: Odoacer
card.text: Unique. +3 to influence checks against the Woodmen faction and the Beornings faction.

card.name: Old Troll
card.text: Discard on a body check result equal to or one less than his body. +1 EI against Orc characters and/or Troll characters. Special: If you are a Balrog player, this character’s home site is instead any non-D Under-deeps site.

card.name: Orc Brawler
card.text: Discard on a body check result equal to or one less than his body. 1 Corruption. Special: If you are a Balrog player, this character’s home site is instead any non-D Under-deeps site.

card.name: Orc Captain
card.text: Leader. Discard on a body check result equal to his body. +3 EI against Orc characters. +3 to influence checks against Orc factions. Special: If you are a Balrog player, this character’s home site is instead any non-D Under-deeps site.

card.name: Orc Chieftain
card.text: Leader. Discard on a body check result equal to his body. Special: If you are a Balrog player, this character’s home site is instead any non-D Under-deeps site.

card.name: Orc Sniffler
card.text: Discard on a body check result equal to or one less than his body. 1 Corruption. Special: If you are a Balrog player, this character’s home site is instead any non-D Under-deeps site.

card.name: Orc Tracker
card.text: Discard on a body check result equal to or one less than his body. Special: If you are a Balrog player, this character’s home site is instead any non-D Under-deeps site.

card.name: Orc Veteran
card.text: Discard on a body check result equal to his body. 1 Corruption. Special: If you are a Balrog player, this character’s home site is instead any non-D Under-deeps site.

card.name: Ostisen
card.text: Unique. +2 prowess when facing a Dúnadan strike or Man strike.

card.name: Pon Opar
card.text: Unique. +3 EI against Man characters.

card.name: Radbug
card.text: Unique. Discard on a body check result equal to his body.

card.name: Shagrat
card.text: Unique. Leader. Discard on a body check result equal to his body. +4 EI against Orc characters. +4 to influence checks against Orc factions.

card.name: Shámas
card.text: Unique. +1 to influence checks against Man factions. And additional +2 to influence checks against the Dunlendings faction.

card.name: Snaga
card.text: Unique. Discard on a body check result equal to his body.

card.name: Tarcil
card.text: Unique. +1 EI against Dúnadan characters. +1 to influence checks against Dúnadan factions. +1 to prowess when facing a detainment strike.

card.name: Threlin
card.text: Unique. +2 EI against Dwarf characters. +2 to influence checks against Dwarf factions. +1 prowess when facing an Orc strike or an Elf strike.

card.name: Troll Lout
card.text: Discard on a body check result equal to one less than his body. 1 Corruption. Special: If you are a Balrog player, this character’s home site is instead any non-D Under-deeps site.

card.name: Troll-chief
card.text: Discard on a body check result equal to his body. +3 EI against Troll characters. +3 to influence checks against Troll factions. Special: If you are a Balrog player, this character’s home site is instead any non-D Under-deeps site.

card.name: Uchel
card.text: Unique. +4 to influence checks against the Hillmen faction.

card.name: Ufthak
card.text: Unique. Discard on a body check result equal to his body.

card.name: Ulkaur the Tongueless
card.text: Unique. Leader. Discard on a body check result equal to his body. +2 EI against Orc characters and/or Troll characters. +2 to influence checks against Troll factions and Orc factions.

card.name: Adûnaphel the Ringwraith
card.text: Unique. Avatar. -5 mp if eliminated. Action: As your Ringwraith, if at a H or her home site, one of your other characters may untap during the organization phase.

card.name: Akhôrahil the Ringwraith
card.text: Unique. Avatar. -5 mp if eliminated. As your Ringwraith, if a magic short-event is played on Akhôrahil, it is reshuffled into the play deck when it would otherwise be discarded.

card.name: Dwar the Ringwraith
card.text: Unique. Avatar. -5 mp if eliminated. As your Ringwraith, if at a H or his home site, the prowess and body of all your leaders increase by one.

card.name: Hoarmûrath the Ringwraith
card.text: Unique. Avatar. -5 mp if eliminated. As your Ringwraith, if at a H or his home site, your hand size increases by one.

card.name: Indûr the Ringwraith
card.text: Unique. Avatar. -5 mp if eliminated. As your Ringwraith, at the beginning of your end-of-turn phase, you may take one magic card from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Khamûl the Ringwraith
card.text: Unique. Avatar. -5 mp if eliminated. As your Ringwraith -2 body to any attacks against his company. As your Ringwraith, you gain the ability to play one Ringwraith follower.

card.name: Ren the Ringwraith
card.text: Unique. Avatar. -5 mp if eliminated. As your Ringwraith, if at a H or his home site, all your character receive a +1 modification to any corruption checks they make.

card.name: Ûvatha the Ringwraith
card.text: Unique. Avatar. -5 mp if eliminated. As your Ringwraith, you may draw one extra card when his company moves. Action: As your Ringwraith, if at a H or his home site, he may tap during the organization phase to shuffle one resource from your discard pile into your play deck. Special: May be played as a Ringwraith follower of your Ringwraith at any site during the organizaiton phase. He requires no influence to control and does not count against the one character/turn limit.

card.name: The Witch-king
card.text: Unique. Avatar. Leader. -5 mp if eliminated. As your Ringwraith, you may play Ringwraith followers, and up to two Ringwraith followers require no influence to control. In addition, one Ringwraith follower per turn does not count against the one character per turn limit.

card.name: Arthadan Rangers
card.text: This attack has a number of strikes equal to the number of characters in the company. All strikes of this attack are detainment against covert companies. May be keyed to Arthedain, Rhudaur, Cardolan, The Shire, Hollin, and to sites in these regions. Action: A character with a home site of Bree may tap to cancel this attack.

card.name: Beorning Toll
card.text: This attack has a number of strikes equal to the number of characters in the company. All strikes of this attack are detainment against covert companies. May be keyed to Anduin Vales, Wold & Foothills, High Pass, Redhorn Gate, and to sites in these regions. Action: A character with a home site of Beorn’s House or Woodmen-Town may tap to cancel this attack.

card.name: Border-watch
card.text: Five strikes. If a character facing a strike is a hero, that strike becomes detainment. Special: May also be played as a Long-Event. If so played, the following applies: All Elf, Dwarf, Hobbit, Dúnadan, and Man hazard creatures which may not be keyed by region type may be keyed by name to regions adjacent to the ones listed on their card.

card.name: Elf-lord
card.text: One Strike. Detainment against covert companies. This attack gains +4 prowess against a Ringwraith company or the Balrog’s company. May be keyed to Rhudaur, Lindon, Wold & Foothills, Anfalas, and to sites in thes regions. If Doors of Night is not in play, may be keyed to b.

card.name: Elves upon Errantry
card.text: Four strikes. One strike and detainment against a Wizard Player’s companies.

card.name: Ent in Search of Entwives
card.text: One Strike. May only be played against an overt company.

card.name: Gondorian Rangers
card.text: This attack has a number of strikes equal to the number of characters in the company. All strikes of this attack are detainment against covert companies. May be keyed to Ithilien, Dagorlad, Harondor, Mouths of the Anduin, Brown Lands, and to sites in these regions. Action: A character with a home site of Henneth Annûn or Minas Tirith may tap to cancel this attack.

card.name: Horse-lords
card.text: This attack has a number of strikes equal to the number of characters in the company. All strikes of this attack are detainment against covert companies. May be keyed to Rohan, Wold & Foothills, Gap of Isen, Anórien, and to sites in these regions. Action: A character with a home site of Edoras, Dunharrow, or Helm’s Deep may tap to cancel this attack.

card.name: Landroval
card.text: Unique. May only be played against an overt company. Two strikes. Attacker assigns all strikes.

card.name: Lawless Men
card.text: Two strikes.

card.name: Pirates
card.text: Three strikes. May also be keyed by name to any region adjacent to a c, but receives -2 prowess.

card.name: Sellswords
card.text: Two strikes.

card.name: Sons of Kings
card.text: Three strikes. Playable only against a Ringwraith Player or Balrog player’s companies.

card.name: Thranduil's Folk
card.text: This attack has a number of strikes equal to the number of characters in the company. All strikes of this attack are detainment against covert companies. May be keyed to Woodland Realm, Western Mirkwood, Heart of Mirkwood, Northern Rhovanion, Grey Mountain Narrows, and to sites in these regions. Action: A character with a home site of Thranduil’s Halls may tap to cancel this attack.

card.name: Uruk-lieutenant
card.text: One strike. If the defending company has already faced an orc attack this movement/hazard phase, this attack receives +3 to prowess.

card.name: Wandering Eldar
card.text: This attack has a number of strikes equal to the number of characters in the company. All strikes of this attack are detainment against covert companies. If Doors of Night is not in play, may be keyed to f. Action: A hero character may tap to cancel this attack.

card.name: Wild Trolls
card.text: Two strikes.

card.name: Arouse Defenders
card.text: Playable on a F or B. +2 prowess to all automatic-attacks at this site until the end of the turn. Discard this card at the end of the turn. Action: You may discard this card to cancel an action declared earlier in the same chain of actions which would cancel an automatic-attack at this site.

card.name: Awaken Defenders
card.text: The number of strikes for each automatic-attack at a F or B is doubled. Additionally, each detainment automatic-attack at a minion F or B becomes non-detainment. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Chill Them with Fear
card.text: All Elf, Dwarf, Dúnadan, and Hobbit attacks receive +1 prowess and +1 strike. If Gates of Morning is in play, such attacks receive an additional +1 prowess and +1 strike. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Covetous Thoughts
card.text: Corruption. Playable only on a minion character. Action: At the end of each of his turns, bearer must make a corruption check for each item in his company that he does not bear; each of these checks is modified by subtracting the corruption the item would give him if he bore it. Action: Once during each of your organization phases, make a roll modified by +3 if the character taps. If the result is greater than 8, this card is discarded.

card.name: Darkness Under Tree
card.text: Playable on an Awakened Plant attack before strikes are assigned. The attack receives +1 strike. Discard when the attack is faced.

card.name: Heedless Revelry
card.text: Playable on a company that has not moved and does not contain an avatar. Make a roll for each untapped character in the company modified by -2 for hero characters. If the result is greater than the character’s mind, the character taps or Playable on-guard. May be revealed after the site is tapped to tap all untapped characters in the company. When so revealed, the company may play their allowed minor item (or any allowed item at an Under-deeps site) first.

card.name: Incite Defenders
card.text: Playable on a F or B. The first automatic-attack at this site is faced twice during the site phase. Discard at the end of the turn. May not be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: News of Doom
card.text: Unique. Each player makes a roll for each faction he has in play. Discard any faction if the result is 2 or 3 or if the result plus that player’s unused general influence is less than 10. Remove News of Doom from the game.

card.name: Nothing to Eat or Drink
card.text: Playable on a minion company at or moving to a F or B or Playable on a hero company at or moving to a S or D. The prowess and body of each character in the company is modified by -1. Trigger: Discard this card during your organization phase if this company is at a H. Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

card.name: Plague
card.text: Playable on a wounded non-avatar, non-Elf character that has faced an animal attack this turn. Action: At the end of the bearer’s site phase, each player’s non-avatar, non-Elf characters at the same site as the target must make a roll modified by -2. If the result is greater than the character’s body, he is wounded or he is eliminated if he is already wounded. Trigger: Discard this card during the bearer’s organization phase if he is at H.

card.name: Rats!
card.text: Playable on a company containing at least one minor item that is at or moving to a R, S, or D or playable on a company so moving that has faced an Animal attack this turn. Company discards one minor item of its choice or chooses one of its characters to become wounded.

card.name: Rebel-talk
card.text: Playable on a non-avatar character with a mind of 7 or less. Character cannot be controlled by direct influence. Action: During the organization phase, make a roll. If the result is greater than 7, this card is discarded. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Do Not Trouble To Say We
card.text: Unique. Playable on the One Ring. Action: During each of his organization phases, one character other than the bearer in the bearer’s company is discarded; the bearer’s player chooses. Action: Once during each of the bearer’s organization phases, make a roll modified by +2 if the bearer taps. If the result is greater than 11, discard this card.

card.name: The Roving Eye
card.text: Playable on a non-avatar character bearing a Palantír, Greater Item, or Ring Special Item. Target character makes a corruption check.

card.name: Shut Yer Mouth
card.text: Playable on a non-avatar character. Action: During the organization phase, make a roll. If the result is greater than 7, discard this card. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: So You've Come Back
card.text: Playable on a character of 5 mind or less. The mind of each other non-follower, non-avatar character in his company increases by one. Discard this card during the organization phase if target character is at a H. Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

card.name: Something Has Slipped
card.text: Playable on a company. If any strike against a character in the company succeeds, the prowess of each character in the company is modified by -2 for the rest of the turn. Discard this card during the organization phase if the company is at a H. Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

card.name: Stay Her Appetite
card.text: Playable on an ally. Make a roll modified by adding the ally’s mind and subtracting its controller’s unused GI. If the result is greater than 10, discard the ally.

card.name: Stench of Mordor
card.text: Environment. Does not affect Ringwraith Players. Action: At the start of its site phase, each company at a site in a d must tap one untapped character if available. If Doors of Night is in play, this also applies to s. Discard when any play deck is exhausted. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Thrice Outnumbered
card.text: Each player may take one Man hazard creature from his discard pile and shuffle it into his play deck at the end of each turn after resolving hand size. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Tidings of Bold Spies
card.text: Playable on a company moving to a site with an automatic-attack. The company faces an attack which is a duplicate of the first automatic-attack at the site. Any card which affects the attack so created also affects the first automatic-attack at the site including cancellation.

card.name: Tidings of Doubt
card.text: The EI of each Ringwraith is modified by -2. If Gates of Morning is in play, this modification is instead -3. Discard when any play deck is exhausted. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Veils Flung Away
card.text: Playable on an overt company moving in a w, b, or f if Doors of Night is not in play. Make a body check modified by +1 for each character. Determine if each character is discarded as indicated on their cards. Otherwise, the body checks have no effect unless an untapped character fails his check, in which case he becomes tapped.

card.name: Waiting Shadow
card.text: Environment. Playable on a company with an untapped Orc, Troll, or Man character. Tap an Orc, Troll, or Man character in that company of your opponent’s choice or Playable on a company if Doors of Night is in play. A character in that company of your opponent’s choice is tapped.

card.name: Webs of Fear
card.text: All influence checks are modified only by unused general influence and character’s direct influence regardless of resource and character texts. Modifications to the target number apply as normal.

card.name: Wrath of the West
card.text: Playable on a minion resource short-event declared earlier in the same Chain of Actions. Make a roll and cancel the event if the result is greater than 6.

card.name: Last Child of Ungoliant
card.text: Unique. Spawn. Manifestation of Shelob. Action: Tap to cancel a hazard played against her company before its card play action resolves. Trigger: Discard during the site phase if not at a site in Imlad Morgul, Gorgoroth, or Ithilien.

card.name: Gollum
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Sméagol. May not be played by the Balrog. Action: Tap Gollum if facing a strike to cancel it. Special: Gollum may play cards that require Information as though he were a character, and may play All Though Bent On It as though he were a sage.

card.name: Two-Headed Troll
card.text: Action: Tap this ally when facing an Orc attack or a Troll attack to cancel it.

card.name: War-warg
card.text: May be played at a tapped site. Action: Tap this ally if both he and his controller are assigned strikes from the same attack. Controller receives +2 body when facing his strike.

attr.value: Any site with an Animal automatic-attack

card.name: War-wolf
card.text: May be played at a tapped site. +1 prowess if controller is an Orc.

attr.value: Any Shadow-Hold with an Orc automatic-attack

card.name: The Warg-king
card.text: Unique. +2 to any influence checks by characters in his company against Animal factions. Action: Tap when facing an Animal attack to cancel it.

attr.value: Any site in High Pass or Anduin Vales

card.name: A Malady Without Healing
card.text: Magic. Shadow-Magic. Corruption. Playable during the site phase on an opponent’s non-avatar character at the same site as a Shadow-Mage you control. Shadow-Mage makes a corruption check modified by -5.

card.name: A Nice Place to Hide
card.text: Playable on a Scout facing an attack. Action: Tap the Scout to cancel the attack. Trigger: Discard after the attack is faced.

card.name: Adûnaphel Unleashed
card.text: Playable on Adûnaphel the Ringwraith if she is your Ringwraith. Action: Discard when her company is facing an attack before strikes are assigned to reduce the attack to one strike at -2 body. The strike is assigned to Adûnaphel.

card.name: Akhôrahil Unleashed
card.text: Playable on Akhôrahil the Ringwraith if he is your Ringwraith. You may take a magic card from your play deck or discard pile to your had, reshuffling the play deck if searched.

card.name: All Thought Bent upon It
card.text: Playable during the site phase on an untapped Sage at an untapped site where Information is playable. Tap the Sage and the site. The Sage makes a corruption check. Search your play deck for any item card and bring it to your hand, shuffling the play deck afterward.

card.name: An Untimely Whisper
card.text: Your opponent reveals to you five random cards from his hand.

card.name: Awaiting the Call
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on a character with a mind of 6 or less at a non-H site. For the purposes of controlling this character, his mind is halved (round down). Discard this card when the character moves. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Back to the Fray
card.text: Each player may remove any number of characters from his discard pile regardless of alignment and shuffle them into his play deck.

card.name: Bade to Rule
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on your Ringwraith at a H. +5 GI. Action: You may discard this card during any of your organization phases. Trigger: Discard this card if your Ringwraith moves. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Bitter Cold
card.text: Magic. Sorcery. Playable on a Sorceror. All attacks against the character’s company suffer a -1 modification to prowess and body. Character makes a corruption check modified by -4. Discard at the end of the turn.

card.name: Black Rain
card.text: Environment. Magic. Sorcery. Playable on an untapped Sorceror Ringwraith at a site where Information is playable during the site phase. Tap the Ringwraith. Opponent must reveal to you a character from his hand if available; otherwise, he must reveal his entire hand. If a character is so revealed, make a roll modified by -1 (by -2 if Skies of Fire is not in play). According to the result, you may place a Ring Special Item from your hand with the Ringwraith: 10+ — The One Ring 8+ — Dwarven Ring 7- — Spirit Ring Special: This is not considered a ring test.

card.name: Black Rider
card.text: Black Rider Mode. Playable at a H during the organization phase on your Ringwraith. His company may move to non-H sites. Discard this card if another Mode card is played on your Ringwraith.

card.name: Blow Turned
card.text: Playable on a Warrior facing a strike. Target warrior takes no penalty to prowess for remaining untapped against the strike. Discard when the strike is faced.

card.name: Bold Thrust
card.text: Playable on a Warrior facing a strike. The Warrior receives +3 to prowess and -1 to body. Discard when the strike is faced.

card.name: Burning Rick, Cot, and Tree
card.text: Playable on a company at a tapped B with an automatic-attack during the site phase. The company faces two attacks: Same type as first automatic-attack — 4 strikes at 7 prowess Same type as first automatic-attack — 1 strike at 9 prowess Action: You may tap a character immediately after facing these attacks to store this card. Otherwise, it is discarded. Trigger: If this card is stored, discard any factions you have in play that have the site as their home site. Cannot be duplicated at a given site.

card.name: By the Ringwraith's Word
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on one of your other characters at the same site as your Ringwraith. The character becomes Leader, receives +4 EI against characters in his company, and cannot be discarded by a body check. Trigger: If there is a character in bearer’s company with a higher mind, discard this card. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Catch an Elusive Scent
card.text: Playable on an untapped Scout during the site phase. Tap the Scout. You may play any non-Greater item that is listed as playable on the site’s card. This does not tap the site, and the item may be played at an already tapped site.

card.name: Come By Night Upon Them
card.text: Playable on a B or F. -1 to the prowess of all automatic-attacks at the site. If Doors of Night is in play, all automatic-attacks at the site receive an additional -1 prowess. The first item played at the site does not tap the site. Discard at the end of the turn.

card.name: Crack in the Wall
card.text: Playable when a company containing a Sage declares movement during the organization phase. Tap the Sage. If the company’s site path contains no f, no hazard creatures may be keyed by site on the company. Discard if the company no longer contains a sage or at the end of the turn.

card.name: Crooked Promptings
card.text: Playable on a Diplomat. One influence check by a character in the Diplomat’s company receives a +3 bonus or One corruption check by a character in the Diplomat’s company receives a +2 bonus.

card.name: Deeper Shadow
card.text: Magic. Shadow-Magic. Playable during the movement/hazard phase on a moving Shadow-Mage. The hazard limit is reduced by one or Playable on a R that a Shadow Mage is moving to. The R becomes a S or Playable on a w region card in a Shadow Mage’s site path. The w becomes a s. In all cases, the character makes a corruption check modified by -3. Discard at the end of the turn.

card.name: Diversion
card.text: Playable on an unwounded character facing an attack. Wound target character to cancel the attack.

card.name: Down Down to Goblin-town
card.text: Playable when a company declares movement during the organization phase. If the company is moving to a R, no hazard creatures may be keyed by region on the company. Discard at the end of the turn.

card.name: Dwar Unleashed
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on Dwar the Ringwraith if he is your Ringwraith. Action: Discard this card during the organization phase to allow Dwar’s company to move with region movement this turn.

card.name: Fell Rider
card.text: Fell Rider Mode. Playable during the organization phase on your Ringwraith at a H. Discard all allies and Ringwraith followers in the company; none may join the company. Your Ringwraith may move to non-H sites. Your Ringwraith’s site path may contain c regions. Your Ringwraith’s company is overt. May not be duplicated on a given Ringwraith. Discard this card if another mode card is played on your Ringwraith.

card.name: Focus Palantír
card.text: Playable on a Palantír in the same company as a Sage. The bearer of the Palantír has the ability to use the Palantír. Discard this card if the bearer of the Palantír moves. If the Palantír is stored, this card is also stored.

card.name: Forced March
card.text: Playable on a company whose new site is a H during step 10 of the movement process. The company may move again.

card.name: Foul Trophies
card.text: Any Orc or Troll character that has faced a strike from a defeated creature may elect to take that creature’s card as a trophy once it is defeated. A character’s trophies give them a bonus based on the total mp indicated on the cards, regardless of the actual mp given to the player: 1+ — +1 EI 2+ — +1 prowess 3+ — an additional +1 EI 4+ — an additional +1 prowess If a character bearing a trophy is discarded or eliminated, each trophy is placed in a mp pile. May not be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Freeze the Flesh
card.text: Magic. Shadow-Magic. Playable on a character that would otherwise be eliminated by a body check this turn if a Shadow-Mage is in his company. The character is tapped instead of eliminated. The character’s company is overt. The Shadow-Mage makes a corruption check modified by -4.

card.name: Gifts as Given of Old
card.text: +3 to an influence check against a faction.

card.name: Gold Chains in the Wind
card.text: Magic. Shadow-Magic. Playable on a Shadow-Mage. This card acts as an ally with a prowess of 5. This ally is assigned a strike from any attacks its bearer faces. The Shadow-Mage makes a corruption check modified by -4. Discard if any strike against this ally succeeds.

card.name: Heralded Lord
card.text: Heralded Lord Mode. Playable during the organization phase on your Ringwraith at a H. +3 EI to each character in your Ringwraith’s company if not at a H. Your Ringwraith’s company may move to non-Darkhaven sites. May not be duplicated by a given player. Discard this card if another mode card is played on your Ringwraith.

card.name: Hidden Ways
card.text: Playable on a company containing an untapped Ranger during the organization phase. Tap the Ranger. No creatures may be keyed to w against the company. Discard at the end of the turn or if the company no longer contains a Ranger.

card.name: Hide in Dark Places
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on a company containing a Scout that has not declared movement. All hazard creature attacks against the company are canceled. Discard if the company moves or no longer contains a Scout.

card.name: Hoarmûrath Unleashed
card.text: Playable on a Hoarmûrath the Ringwraith if he is your Ringwraith and untapped. Tap Hoarmurath to cancel an attack against any one of your companies.

card.name: Honey on the Tongue
card.text: Playable on a character in the same company as a Diplomat. Bearer receives +5 EI against characters. Discard if bearer’s company no longer contains a Diplomat or at the end of the turn. May not be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: I'll Be At Your Heels
card.text: Command. Playable on a Leader during the organization phase. +1 to all corruption checks by characters in his company. You may return this card to your hand during any organization phase. Special: A leader may only have one Command played on him at a time.

card.name: I'll Report You
card.text: Command. Playable on a Leader during the organization phase. +1 prowess to all characters in his company. You may return this card to your hand during any organization phase. Special: A Leader may only have on Command played on him at a time.

card.name: In the Name of Mordor
card.text: Playable on an untapped character whose company is facing a detainment attack keyed by name or type to a d, s, D, or S. Tap the character to cancel the attack or Playable on a Nazgûl permanent event. The Nazgûl event is discarded. Special: May not be played by a Balrog player.

card.name: Indûr Unleashed
card.text: Playable on Indûr the Ringwraith if he is your Ringwraith and facing an attack. The attack is canceled or Playable on Indûr the Ringwraith if he is your Ringwraith and his company is moving. Reduce the hazard limit by one.

card.name: Iron-road
card.text: Playable on a company at a H that has declared movement during the organization phase. The opponent may draw up to double the normal amount of cards when this company moves. Discard at the end of the turn. Special Movement: At the beginning of the end-of-turn phase, replace the company’s current site with the site at which they began the turn.

card.name: Khamûl Unleashed
card.text: Playable on Khamûl the Ringwraith if he is your Ringwraith and is facing an attack before strikes are assigned. The attack receives -3 prowess.

card.name: Kill All But NOT the Halflings
card.text: Playable during the site phase on a company at Bag End. Company faces an attack: Hobbits — 4 strikes at 6 prowess Action: Tap a character immediately after facing this attack to place this card with him; otherwise, discard this card. Action: If no other copy of this card has been stored, you may store this card at Barad-Dûr during the organization phase. You receive this card’s mp. Special: If a copy of this card has been stored, all other copies are worth 1 mp. May not be played by Balrog players. May not be played if your are Fallen Gandalf.

card.name: Leg It Double Quick
card.text: Playable on a moving company during step 10 of the movement process. Tap all untapped characters in the company. The company may move to an additional site this turn.

card.name: The Lidless Eye
card.text: All Ringwraith players receive +7 GI if their Ringwraith is not in play. The hand size of all Ringwraith players increases by one. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Messenger of Mordor
card.text: Magic. Spirit-Magic. Playable on a Spirit-Mage at a H, D, or S. Any items in his company that can be stored at a generic H may now be so stored. Character makes a corruption check modified by -4.

card.name: Morgul-blade
card.text: Playable on a Ringwraith. Each strike the Ringwraith faces receives -1 body and -1 prowess. Cannot be duplicated on a given Ringwraith. Trigger: Discard Morgul-Blade after a strike against its bearer is defeated.

card.name: Motionless Among the Slain
card.text: Playable on an attack. You assign all strikes of the attack. All body checks resulting from the attack are modified by +1.

card.name: The Names Among Them
card.text: Playable on an untapped Scout immediately after facing an automatic-attack at a B or F. Tap the Scout. Action: Bearer may discard this card to cancel an automatic-attack at a F or B. Action: You may store this card at a H during the organization phase. If stored, you receive this card’s mp.

card.name: News Must Get Through
card.text: Playable on a company at a H, D, or S. Any resource events in his company that can be stored at a generic H may now be so stored.

card.name: News of the Shire
card.text: Playable during the site phase on an untapped character at Bag End. Tap the character. Action: You may store this card at Barad-Dûr during the organization phase. If stored, you receive this card’s mp, and no other copy of this card can be stored. Special: If any copy of this card is stored, all versions of Bag End become B.

card.name: No More Nonsense
card.text: Playable on a Leader during the organization phase. 1 Corruption. May not be duplicated on a given Leader.

card.name: No News of Our Riding
card.text: Playable on an untapped character immediately after his company faces an Elf, Dúnadan, Dwarf, or Man hazard creature attack. Tap the character. Action: The bearer may tap to cancel any attack of the listed types against his company.

card.name: Not Slay Needlessly
card.text: Playable on an Elf, Dwarf, Dúnadan, Man, or Hobbit attack. Against a covert company, the attack is canceled. Otherwise, -2 to the attack’s prowess. Discard after the attack is faced. Cannot be duplicated on a given attack.

card.name: Old Cache
card.text: Playable on a site where Major Items are playable. Non-unique Major and Minor Items played at this site do not tap the site. Trigger: Discard when the site taps.

card.name: Old Prejudice
card.text: Triple all standard modifications for influence checks against factions.

card.name: One Dear to You
card.text: Playable on a faction you have in play. -1 to the faction’s mp. Any influence attempt against the faction is modified by -8.

card.name: Orc Quarrels
card.text: Playable on an Orc, Troll, or Man attack. Cancel the attack.

card.name: Orc Stealth
card.text: Playable on an Orc Scout facing a strike. Cancel the strike.

card.name: Orc-mounts
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on an overt company. The hazard limit is increased by two. The prowess of any attacks the company faces is modified by -1. Cannot be duplicated on a given company. Discard at the end of the turn.

card.name: Poisonous Despair
card.text: Magic. Spirit-Magic. Playable on a Spirit-Mage at any time if an influence check will be made against one of your characters or resources. The attempt automatically fails. Character makes a corruption check modified by -3.

card.name: Ready to His Will
card.text: Playable on a non-unique Orc, Troll, Giant, Undead or Man hazard creature which normally has one strike for each of its attacks. All attacks of the creature are canceled. Action: After any attacks from the creature have been faced, a character in the company may tap make the creature an ally. Place the creature’s card with this card under the control of the character. The ally is of the creature’s type, has a prowess equal to its normal prowess -7, adopts the attributes on this card, and is worth 1 Ally mp. Discard this card if no ally is created.

card.name: Remnants of Old Robberies
card.text: Playable on a non-animal hazard creature attack that a company has just defeated. Place this card with the attack’s card. This card is worth a number of miscellaneous mp equal to the kill mp the defeated creatures would give a hero player.

card.name: Ren Unleashed
card.text: Playable on Ren the Ringwraith if he is your Ringwraith. All characters of all players at the same site as Ren must make a corruption check modified by -2.

card.name: The Ring Leaves Its Mark
card.text: Bring one Mode Card from your sideboard or discard pile into your play deck and reshuffle or Playable on your tapped Ringwraith. Make a roll. If the result is greater than 6, untap your Ringwraith.

card.name: Rumor of the One
card.text: All Gold Ring Items, both Hero and Minion, receive +1 corruption point. All ring tests are modified by +1. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Ruse
card.text: Playable on an untapped Diplomat in a covert company facing an attack. Tap the Diplomat. The attack is canceled or Playable on a Scout facing an attack before strikes are assigned. No strikes of the attack may be assigned to the Scout. Discard when the attack is faced.

card.name: Secrets of Their Forging
card.text: Playable during the site phase on an untapped Sage at an untapped site where Information is playable. Tap the Sage and the Site. Action: Discard this card to test a Gold Ring Item in the Sage’s company. No roll is used, instead, you may play any Ring Special Item other than the One Ring from your hand for which the ring could normally be tested.

card.name: Seize Prisoners
card.text: Playable during the site phase at a tapped F with an automatic-attack. The company faces an attack: Same type as the first automatic attack at the site — 3 strikes at 8 prowess Action: Immediately after the attack, you may tap a character at the site to place this card with them; the bearer may not untap. Discard this card otherwise. Action: You may store this card at a H, D, or S during the organization phase. If stored, you receive this card’s mp.

card.name: Skies of Fire
card.text: Environment. When this card’s card play action resolves, discard all hazard environment cards and cancel all hazard environment effects. Gates of Morning is considered to be in play for the purpose of interpreting hazards. May not be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Smart and Secret
card.text: Command. Playable on a Leader during the organization phase. +1 body to all characters in his company. You may return this card to your hand during the organization phase. Special: A Leader may only have on command card played on him at a time.

card.name: Smoke on the Wind
card.text: Playable on a company at a tapped F with an automatic-attack during the site phase. The company faces two attacks: Same type as first automatic-attack — 5 strikes at 8 prowess Same type as first automatic-attack — 1 strike at 10 prowess Action: You may tap a character immediately after facing these attacks to store this card. Otherwise, it is discarded. Trigger: If this card is stored, discard any factions you have in play that have the site as their home site. Cannot be duplicated at a given site.

card.name: Sneakin'
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on a company containing a Scout and no more than three characters/allies. No creature cards may be played on the company. Discard if the company contains more than three characters/allies or no longer contains a Scout. Otherwise, discard at the end of the turn.

card.name: Some Secret Art of Flame
card.text: Magic. Sorcery. Playable on a Sorceror facing a strike. +4 prowess. Character makes a corruption check modified by -4. Discard after the strike is faced.

card.name: Spying out the Land
card.text: Magic. Spirit-Magic. Playable on a Spirit-Mage during the organization phase. Opponent may reveal and place off to the side any hazards from his hand, and only those hazards can be played during the character’s movement/hazard phase. Character makes a corruption check modified by -3. At the end of the turn, discard this card and return any hazards placed off to the side with it to your opponent’s hand.

card.name: Stabbed Him in His Sleep
card.text: Playable during the site phase on an untapped Scout at a B or F with an automatic attack. The Scout faces an attack of the same type as the first automatic attack at the site. This attack is 1 strike at 8 prowess. If the Scout is not untapped after the attack, discard this card, otherwise, place it in your mp pile.

card.name: Sudden Call
card.text: Playable if you are a Ringwraith player or a Balrog player who has met the required mp total to end the game. Your opponent receives one last turn. Special: You may play this card as a hazard against a Ringwraith or Balrog opponent if he has met the required mp total to end the game. In this case, you receive one last turn.

card.name: Swag
card.text: The minor item you are allowed to play as a result of tapping a site may be taken from your sideboard.

card.name: Swarm of Bats
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on an overt company at a H, S, or D. Any attack against this company has its prowess and body modified by -1. Cannot be duplicated on a given company. Trigger: Discard this card if the company is no longer overt.

card.name: Swift Strokes
card.text: Playable on a Warrior facing a strike. You may make two rolls and choose which one to use. Discard after the strike is faced.

card.name: Test of Fire
card.text: Playable on a Sage. Action: You may discard this card to test a Gold Ring Item in the Sage’s company. If a Ringwraith is in the Sage’s company, -2 to the roll.

card.name: That Ain't No Secret
card.text: Playable during the site phase on an untapped character at a site where Information is playable. Tap the character. Action: You may store this card at a H during any phase; if stored, you receive this card’s mp.

card.name: That's Been Heard Before
card.text: Playable during the site phase on a untapped character in a covert company at a B or F where Information is playable. Tap the character. Bearer may not untap. Action: You may store this card at a H during any phase; if stored, you receive this card’s mp.

card.name: They Ride Together
card.text: Playable on your Ringwraith. You may play one Ringwraith Follower.

card.name: Thing Stolen
card.text: Playable during the site phase on an untapped Scout at a F or B. Tap the scout. Place up to two minor items from your sideboard with the Scout.

card.name: Threats
card.text: Playable on a Warrior attempting to influence a faction. Warrior does not use his unused EI for the attempt. The roll is modified by a number equal to the Warrior’s prowess to a maximum of +6.

card.name: Tidings of Death
card.text: -1 to each influence check against a faction, but for each influence check make an additional roll and choose which result to use. Special: This card is also a Hero Resource.

card.name: To Satisfy the Questioner
card.text: Playable during the site phase on an untapped character at an untapped F. Tap the character and the site. Bearer may not untap. Action: You may store this card at a H during your organization phase; if stored, you receive this card’s mp.

card.name: Under His Blow
card.text: Playable on a character facing a strike. Target character receives no prowess penalty for not tapping against the strike. The body check roll is modified by -1 if target character is wounded by the strike. Discard after the strike is faced.

card.name: Ûvatha Unleashed
card.text: Playable on Ûvatha the Ringwraith if he is your Ringwraith. Action: Discard this card during step 10 of the movement/hazard phase to allow Ûvatha’s company to move again.

card.name: Veils of Shadow
card.text: Magic. Sorcery. Playable on a Sorceror facing an automatic attack before strikes are assigned. The number of strikes of all automatic-attacks at the site is set to one after all other modifiers. Character makes a corruption check modified by -4. Discard at the end of the turn.

card.name: Weigh All Things to a Nicety
card.text: Bring one resource or character from your sideboard or discard pile into your play deck and shuffle.

card.name: The Witch-king Unleashed

Action Trigger: A company that moves through at least one of the following regions faces an attack: Dragon — 2 strikes at 15 prowess, 9 body: Withered Heath, Northern Rhovanion, Grey Mountain Narrows, Iron Hills. card.text: Weapon. If bearer is a Warrior, +2 to prowess.

card.name: Dwarven Ring of Barin's Tribe
card.text: Unique. Dwarven Ring. Playable after a Ring Test indicates a Dwarven Ring. Values in parenthesis apply to a Dwarf bearer, and a Dwarf bearer gains an additional +5 EI. Action: Tap a Dwarf bearer during the site phase to search your play deck for a Major Item or Gold Ring Item playable at the bearer’s site. Reshuffle the play deck. The Dwarf makes a corruption check modified by +2.

card.name: Dwarven Ring of Bávor's Tribe
card.text: Unique. Dwarven Ring. Playable after a Ring Test indicates a Dwarven Ring. Values in parenthesis apply to a Dwarf bearer, and a Dwarf bearer gains an additional +5 EI. Action: Tap a Dwarf bearer during the site phase to search your play deck for a Greater Item playable at the bearer’s site. Reshuffle the play deck. The Dwarf makes a corruption check modified by +2.

card.name: Dwarven Ring of Drúin's Tribe
card.text: Unique. Dwarven Ring. Playable after a Ring Test indicates a Dwarven Ring. Values in parenthesis apply to a Dwarf bearer, and a Dwarf bearer gains an additional +5 EI. Action: Tap a Dwarf bearer during the site phase to search your play deck for a Greater Item playable at the bearer’s site. Reshuffle the play deck. The Dwarf makes a corruption check modified by +2.

card.name: Dwarven Ring of Durin's Tribe
card.text: Unique. Dwarven Ring. Playable after a Ring Test indicates a Dwarven Ring. Values in parenthesis apply to a Dwarf bearer, and a Dwarf bearer gains an additional +5 EI. Action: Tap a Dwarf bearer during the site phase to untap his current site. The Dwarf makes a corruption check modified by +2.

card.name: Dwarven Ring of Dwálin's Tribe
card.text: Unique. Dwarven Ring. Playable after a Ring Test indicates a Dwarven Ring. Values in parenthesis apply to a Dwarf bearer, and a Dwarf bearer gains an additional +5 EI. Action: Tap a Dwarf bearer during the site phase to search your play deck for a Major Item or Gold Ring Item playable at the bearer’s site. Reshuffle the play deck. The Dwarf makes a corruption check modified by +2.

card.name: Foul-smelling Paste
card.text: Action: Discard this item to heal a character in the bearer’s company to an untapped state.

card.name: Gleaming Gold Ring
card.text: May only be played at a B. Action Trigger: Bearer makes a corruption check at the end of his untap phase. Discard this item when tested. If you have one in your hand, you may play a Ring Special Item based on the results of the test: Magic Ring: Less than or equal to 6 Dwarven Ring: 9-12+ Spirit Ring: 10-12 Lesser Ring: Any Result — you may play such an item from your sideboard.

card.name: Fancied Gold Ring
card.text: May only be played at a R or Bag End. Action Trigger: Bearer makes a corruption check at the end of his untap phase. Discard this item when tested. If you have one in your hand, you may play a Ring Special Item based on the results of the test: Magic Ring: Less than or equal to 5 Dwarven Ring: 8-12 The One Ring: 11-12+ Lesser Ring: Any Result

card.name: High Helm
card.text: Unique. Helmet. If bearer is a Warrior, he receives +1 to prowess to a maximum of 8.

card.name: The Iron Crown
card.text: Unique. Helmet. Action: You may tap this card if the bearer is facing an Orc, Troll, or Man attack to cancel it. Special: If stored at Barad-Dûr, values in parenthesis apply.

card.name: Least of Gold Rings
card.text: Action Trigger: Bearer makes a corruption check at the end of his untap phase. Discard this item when tested. If you have one in your hand, you may play a Ring Special Item based on the results of the test: Magic Ring: Less than or equal to 7 Dwarven Ring: 10-12 The One Ring: 12+ Lesser Ring: Any Result

card.name: Magic Ring of Delusion
card.text: Magic Ring. Playable after a Ring Test indicates a Magic Ring. +1 to all corruption checks by the character required by Spirit-Magic cards. If the bearer is a Spirit-Mage, you may bring one Spirit-Magic card from your discard pile to your hand at the end of your turn after resolving hand size. Otherwise, bearer gains the Spirit-Mage skill. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Magic Ring of Enigma
card.text: Magic Ring. Playable after a Ring Test indicates a Magic Ring. If the bearer is a Sage, you may perform the following Action: tap the bearer to test a Gold Ring Item . Otherwise, bearer gains the Sage skill. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Magic Ring of Fury
card.text: Magic Ring. Playable after a Ring Test indicates a Magic Ring. If the bearer is a Warrior, he gains +2 prowess. Otherwise, bearer gains the Warrior skill. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Magic Ring of Guile
card.text: Magic Ring. Playable after a Ring Test indicates a Magic Ring. If the bearer is a Scout, you may perform the following Action: Tap Magic Ring of Stealth to cancel an attack or to cancel a strike. Bearer makes a corruption check. Otherwise, bearer gains the Scout skill. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Magic Ring of Lies
card.text: Magic Ring. Playable after a Ring Test indicates a Magic Ring. If the bearer is a Diplomat, +6 to influence checks against opponent’s resources and characters. Otherwise, bearer gains the Diplomat skill. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Magic Ring of Savagery
card.text: Magic Ring. Playable after a Ring Test indicates a Magic Ring. If the bearer is a Ranger, you may bring one Awakened Plant, Spider, or Animal ally from your discard pile to your hand at the end of your turn after resolving hand size. Otherwise, bearer gains the Ranger skill. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Magic Ring of Shadows
card.text: Magic Ring. Playable after a Ring Test indicates a Magic Ring. If the bearer is a Shadow-Mage, you may bring one Shadow-Magic card from your discard pile to your hand at the end of your turn after resolving hand size. Otherwise, bearer gains the Shadow-Mage skill. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Magic Ring of Weals
card.text: Magic Ring. Playable after a Ring Test indicates a Magic Ring. +1 to corruption checks by the bearer required by Sorcery cards. If the bearer is a Sorceror, you may bring one Sorcery card from your discard pile to your hand at the end of your turn after resolving hand size. Otherwise, bearer gains the Sorceror skill. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Minor Ring
card.text: Lesser Ring. Playable after a Ring Test indicates a Lesser Ring.

card.name: The Mithril-coat
card.text: Unique. Armor.

card.name: The One Ring
card.text: Unique. The One Ring. Playable after a Ring Test indicates The One Ring. Bearer receives +5 to prowess to a maximum of double his starting prowess. All characters in the bearer’s company including the bearer receive an additional corruption point. Action: The bearer may make a corruption check when facing a non-Undead, non-Nazgûl strike to cancel the strike.

card.name: The Oracle's Ring
card.text: Spirit Ring. Playable after a Ring Test indicates a Spirit Ring. Hazards which affect a character’s EI or influence checks do not affect the bearer.

card.name: Orc-draughts
card.text: Action: Bearer may discard to give +1 prowess to all characters in his company until the end of the turn.

card.name: Orc-liquor
card.text: Action: Bearer may discard to give +2 body to all characters in his company until the end of the turn.

card.name: Palantír of Amon Sûl
card.text: Unique. Palantír. Action: With its bearer able to use a Palantír, tap Palantir of Amon Sûl to look at your opponent’s hand or to duplicated the Action of the minion version of Palantír of Elostirion or Palantir of Annúminas if either is in play. Bearer makes a corruption check.

card.name: Palantír of Annúminas
card.text: Unique. Palantír. Action: With its beare able to use a Palantír, tap Palantír of Annúminas to look through youru play deck, discard pile, or sideboard for any card playable on a Sage and to bring such a card to your hand. Shuffle your play deck if searched. Bearer makes a corruption check.

card.name: Palantír of Elostirion
card.text: Unique. Palantír. Playable at The White Towers. If the bearer is a Sage, your hand size increases by one. Action: If bearer is a Sage, you may tap Palantír of Elostirion to draw one card. Bearer makes a corruption check. Trigger: If the bearer moves, discard this card.

card.name: Palantír of Minas Tirith
card.text: Unique. Palantír. Playable at Minas Tirith. Action: With its bearer able to use a Palantír, tap Palantír of Minas Tirith to look at the top 5 cards of your play deck and replace them in any order you choose. Repeat this process for your opponent’s play deck. Bearer makes a corruption check.

card.name: Palantír of Orthanc
card.text: Unique. Palantír. Playable at Isengard. Action: With its bearer able to use a Palantír, tap Palantír of Orthanc to bring one card from your play discard pile to your play deck and shuffle. Bearer makes a corruption check.

card.name: Palantír of Osgiliath
card.text: Unique. Palantír. Action: With its bearer able to use a Palantír, tap Palantír of Osgiliath to discard a hazard permanent-event or long-event in play or to duplicate the Action of any minion version of any other Palantír in play. Bearer makes a corruption check.

card.name: Paltry Ring
card.text: Lesser Ring. Playable after a Ring Test indicates a Lesser Ring. Bearer receives +3 to prowess against detainment attacks. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Perfect Gold Ring
card.text: Hoard Item. Action Trigger: Bearer makes a corruption check at the end of his untap phase. Discard this item when tested. If you have one in your hand, you may play a Ring Special Item based on the results of the test: Magic Ring: Less than or equal to 7 Dwarven Ring: 10-12+ Spirit Ring: Any Result

card.name: Poison
card.text: Action: If bearer is facing a strike, he may tap this item to give -1 prowess and -2 body to the strike. This card does not untap. Action Trigger: Untap this card if it is tapped and you move through a w.

card.name: Red Book of Westmarch
card.text: Unique. Playable at Bag End. Special: If stored at Barad-Dûr, this item is worth 5 mp.

card.name: The Reviled Ring
card.text: Spirit Ring. Playable after a Ring Test indicates a Spirit Ring.

card.name: Sable Shield
card.text: Unique. Shield. If a strike against the bearer is successful, he is not wounded. Instead, the attacker makes a roll and discards this card if the result is greater than 6.

card.name: Scroll of Isildur
card.text: Unique. Lost Knowledge. Playable at Minas Tirith if the site is tapped. Special: If stored at Barad-dûr, this card is worth 5 mp and all your ring tests are modified by +1.

card.name: Shadow-cloak
card.text: Action: If bearer is facing a strike keyed by type to any number of s, d, S, or D, you may tap this item to cancel the strike.

card.name: Strange Rations
card.text: Action: Discard to untap bearer.

card.name: Trifling Ring
card.text: Lesser Ring. Playable after a Ring Test indicates a Lesser Ring. Bearer receives +3 to EI against characters in his company. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: The Warding Ring
card.text: Spirit Ring. Playable after a Ring Test indicates a Spirit Ring.

card.name: Whip
card.text: Bearer receives +2 EIagainst any one character with a mind and prowess less than the bearer’s.
